WorkItem.Description:
Running on Windows XP, sp3.
Â 
I double click Rawr.exe.
It shows the splash screen.
Splash screen disappears.
Nothing happens.  I took a look at the processes to see if it was running and i just wasn't seeing anything, but Rawr.exe in the Processes list shows up for a bit, then goes away again.
WorkItem.Summary: Rawr dies right after splash screen

Comments.Message: The priest models had a nasty crashing bug in 2.1.1. Until we get 2.1.2 released, here's a beta of 2.1.2 to use: http://dl-client.getdropbox.com/u/38028/Rawr%20b2.1.2.zip
ah ha! thank you thank you! loads finally =)
Awesome!  I was having the same problem.  Thanks

I still have this issue with. I'm on Vista. (32-bit).

I tried both 2.1.4, and now 2.1.2b. Same problem. Loads the splash screen for a split second, then nothing.
